title: FPS Keeps dropping during laning and teamfights
body:
Hi guys, 
So whenever I lane with massive creeps or whenever we get into some serious team fights I tend to FPS drop to 10-. I was wondering what i can do to upgrade my computer to make it more smooth.. NOTE that i am on a budget so i will be doing it slowly. I only have 300$ MAX to spend right now. What is the very first thing i can do to upgrade this system.

Specs:
Processor: AMD A*-3820 APU with radeon HD graphics 2.50GHz
6G of ram
WIN7
1TB SSD

replies.body: Your specs are pretty nice, and I don't think you could be experiencing a hardware issue.  It sounds like your computer is having trouble rendering your game, and a solution might be as simple as updating your video drivers.  Check out our [FPS Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide which will have some steps to get this fixed up for you.  Hopefully this will get you back in the game without any stuttering!
